# sakura_security_control_activation (Data Source)

Get information about an existing Security Control's Activation.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_security_control_activation" "foobar" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `automated_action_limit` (Number) The number of registerable automated actions
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the Security Control is enabled
- `service_principal_id` (String) The Service Principal ID associated with the Project
